abstract: Hostility from Chinese regulators and bank financing problems have raised two potentially insurmountable obstacles to plans by an obscure Chinese machinery company to buy General Motors’s Hummer division, people close to the negotiations said on Tuesday, The New York Times reported.
snippet: Hostility from Chinese regulators and bank financing problems have raised two potentially insurmountable obstacles to plans by an obscure Chinese machinery company to buy General Motors’s Hummer division, people close to the negotiations said on T...
lead_paragraph: Hostility from Chinese regulators and bank financing problems have raised two potentially insurmountable obstacles to plans by an obscure Chinese machinery company to buy General Motors‘s Hummer division, people close to the negotiations said on Tuesday, Keith Bradsher reported in The New York Times.

headline.main: As Deadline Nears, Hummer Deal in Trouble

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Hummer Division of General Motors Corp
